articles.title: LIC shares turn positive for 2023 after 20% rally in a month; Will it retest its IPO price? - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Kotak Institutional Equities along with Citi are the only two brokerages that have their LIC price targets above its IPO price. Citi also has a price target of ₹1,045 on the stock.
